# E  {#sec-E.unnumbered}



In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "d" or "D".



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
geome <- c('geom_e')
sectione <- c(7.1)
dfe <- data.frame(geom = geome,
                  section = sectione)
dfe |> knitr::kable() 
```
